title: Interior Minister pays tribute to martyred Capt Muhammad Osama bin Arshad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 9 (APP): Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi on Tuesday paid tribute to the sacrifice of Captain Muhammad Osama bin Arshad, who was martyred while bravely fighting against terrorists in North Waziristan.
In his statement, he said that martyred Captain Muhammad Osama bin Arshad, sacrificed his life for the country while fighting the terrorists bravely.
He added that the martyred captain thwarted the nefarious intentions of the terrorists with his ultimate sacrifice.
The minister described Captain Muhammad Osama bin Arshad, as a brave son of Pakistan, stating that such brave officers and soldiers are the pride of the nation.
Naqvi said that the country will always remember the great sacrifice of this courageous son.
Expressing his condolences, the interior minister stated that the officers and soldiers of the security forces have cultivated peace with their precious blood. He extended his heartfelt sympathy and condolences to the family of the martyred Captain Muhammad Osama bin Arshad.
The nation is mourning the loss of this brave officer who laid down his life in the line of duty to protect the country from the menace of terrorism.
